Title: MILF
Writer: Jérôme L'hotsky (original scenario), Stéphane Kramer (original scenario), Axelle Laffont (adaptation), Jean-François Halin (adaptation), Alain Layrac (collaboration), Jonathan Cohen (collaboration), David Lanzmann (collaboration), Lilou Fogli (collaboration)
Actors: Marie-Josée Croze, Virginie Ledoyen, Axelle Laffont, Waël Sersoub
Plot: Three best friends in their forties start a relationship with younger men while on vacation.
